song_name: Mr Bean Animated Series Theme Tune
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Mr Bean Animated Series Theme Tune is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Mr Bean Animated Series Theme Tune has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Minor,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
